com.parkingtycoon.views

Class AnimatedSpriteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.parkingtycoon.views.BaseView
      • com.parkingtycoon.views.SpriteView
        • com.parkingtycoon.views.AnimatedSpriteView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarrierView, BluePrintView, CarView, ElevatorView, FlagView, QueueSignView

    public class AnimatedSpriteView
extends SpriteView
    This Class is responsible for showing a sprite with animations
    Author:
    Hilko Janssen

        protected boolean play(java.lang.String animationName,

        With this method you can play an animation.

        loop - Whether the animation should loop

      • play

        protected boolean play(java.lang.String animationName,
                       boolean loop,
                       int beginFrame)
        With this method you can play an animation.
        Parameters:
        animationName - Name of the animation
        loop - Whether the animation should loop
        beginFrame - Frame where the animation has to start
        Returns:
        Whether the animation was found
